title: Evaluate Topic Classification Learner at scale
description:
What are we trying to evaluate:

* Do LLMs label topic with an acceptable accuracy?
* Which is the best performing prompt?

To do:

* Get sample of domains to test from high quality manually curated sample
* Test most popular topic performance (from 190 focus topics)
* Test variations in the prompt e.g. input data on small sample
* Test on `short` definitions - test others after
